location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from [Samuel Manesty, Resident], Bussora [Basra], to Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun, Native Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: In this letter, received 14 February 1802, Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun [Mirza Mahdi 'Ali Khan Bahadur], Native Resident, Bushire, is informed that the Alertwill touch at Bushire on her way to Bombay, and that her Commander has been instructed to receive charge of any advices that Mirza Mehedy Ally Khaun may wish to transmit to the President in Council, Jonathan Duncan. This letter is not signed, but as it is stated as originating from Bussora [Basra], it can be assumed that it is from Samuel Manesty, the Resident there.
